s: November 15, 2020 - And while many consumers will likely think that Amazon is the first supplements brand to institute this type of traceability program, that isn’t the case. As far back as 2010, herbal-supplements brand Gaia Herbs introduced its Meet Your Herbs traceability program.

t: Amazon Elements poised to shake up the supplement space

t: The 10 Best-Selling Vitamins & Supplements on Amazon - Healthgrades
s: December 17, 2021 - While probiotics are a top-selling supplement on Amazon, it can be difficult to understand which kind to buy. Each brand offers different probiotic strains, some include prebiotics, and it’s hard to know how many billions of colony-forming units (CFUs) you actually need.
